gw.renderables
Class ElevatedSurfaceImage

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.worldwind.render.SurfaceImage
      gw.renderables.ElevatedSurfaceImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
gov.nasa.worldwind.Movable, gov.nasa.worldwind.render.Renderable, gov.nasa.worldwind.render.SurfaceTile
public class ElevatedSurfaceImage
extends gov.nasa.worldwind.render.SurfaceImage

Renders an image on a planar layer at a fixed elevation, or on the ground, based on Patrick Murris' code that can be found here: http://patmurris.blogspot.com/2008/09/elevated-surface-image-for-world-wind.html

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Ian Overgard, Patrick Murris
